story: Find all inactive high school students who speak English and have passed their English class but failed at least one other subject (math or science).

Attention all sleuths in the education realm! We’re on a mission to uncover a hidden group of high school students — those who have momentarily stepped away from their studies. Our focus is on those who are fluent in English and have triumphed in their English class, yet faced challenges in at least one other subject, be it math or science. Let’s rally together to identify these individuals and help them get back on track to academic success!

Calling all education detectives! We have an exciting quest ahead of us: to track down a mysterious group of high school students who have temporarily drifted away from their academic journeys. Our mission centers on those who shine in their English classes, showcasing their impressive fluency, yet have encountered hurdles in other subjects like math or science. Let’s unite our efforts to seek out these talented individuals and guide them back to the path of academic achievement. Together, we can ignite their passion for learning and ensure they thrive once more!

Attention all education sleuths! An exhilarating adventure awaits us: we are on a mission to uncover a secretive group of high school students who have momentarily veered off their educational tracks. Our focus is on those brilliant minds who dazzle in their English classes, effortlessly weaving words with remarkable fluency, yet find themselves facing challenges in subjects like math and science. It’s time for us to rally together, to seek out these gifted individuals and steer them back toward the road of academic success. Let’s reignite their passion for learning and help them flourish once again! Together, we can transform their potential into achievement and make a lasting impact on their educational journeys!

Calling all educational detectives! Gear up for an electrifying quest: we’re on a mission to track down a hidden cadre of high school students who have strayed from their academic paths. Our target? Those exceptional individuals who shine brightly in English classes, spinning narratives with effortless grace, yet stumble when faced with the rigors of math and science. It’s time to unite our forces and hunt down these talented minds, guiding them back onto the path of scholarly success. Let’s reignite their love for learning and watch them soar once more! Together, we can transform their untapped potential into remarkable achievements and leave a lasting mark on their educational journeys!

Attention, aspiring educational sleuths! Prepare yourselves for an exhilarating adventure: we are embarking on a critical mission to uncover a hidden group of high school students who have veered off their academic trajectories. Our focus? Those remarkable individuals who effortlessly weave captivating tales in their English classes but find themselves stumbling through the challenges of math and science.

It's time to join forces and seek out these promising talents, guiding them back to the path of academic achievement. Together, we can reignite their passion for learning and watch them take flight once again! By harnessing their untapped potential, we can transform challenges into triumphs and leave an indelible mark on their educational journeys. Let’s rise to the occasion and help these students shine brightly across all subjects!
